articles.title: Michael Slater: Australia ex-cricketer charged with assaulting police
articles.description: Police say they were called to a property in Queensland after reports of a domestic violence incident.
articles.content:
Former Australian cricket great Michael Slater has been charged with assaulting police during a confrontation in a popular Queensland holiday town.
The alleged incident on Friday left one officer wi… [+474 chars]

articles.title: Fox Sports commentator roasted over new gig
articles.description: Fox Sports AFL and cricket commentator Mark Howard is taking his talents to India.
articles.content:
Fox Sports AFL and cricket commentator Mark Howard is taking his talents to India.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
